include(HPX_Message)

# cmake-format: off
set(_hpx_full_modules
    actions
    actions_base
    agas
    agas_base
    async_colocated
    async_distributed
    checkpoint
    checkpoint_base
    collectives
    command_line_handling
    components
    components_base
    compute
    compute_cuda
    distribution_policies
    executors_distributed
    include
    init_runtime
    lcos_distributed
    naming
    naming_base
    performance_counters
    resiliency_distributed
    runtime_components
    runtime_distributed
    segmented_algorithms
    statistics
)
# cmake-format: on

hpx_info("")
hpx_info("  Configuring libhpx modules")

foreach(module ${_hpx_full_modules})
  add_subdirectory(${module})
endforeach()
